ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Benefit of Charismatic Carralion
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that s because he likes (or hates) everyone equally - from the start. Sylly ... From:	Rogers Pessin [mailto:rpessin@yahoo.com] Sent:	Thursday, June 03,
ygData.messageBody:
I think that's because he likes (or hates) everyone equally - from the
start.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Rogers Pessin [mailto:rpessin@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 11:38 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting Benefit of
Charismatic Carralion

From: Rogers Pessin <rpessin@...>

I went and visited the shady swashbuckler in the tunnel
between east
commons and north ro. He is normally indifferent to me. I
checked
his price on a couple of weapons then sung the charismatic
song and
he became amiable to me. He still wanted the same amount of
money
for those well balanced weapons though.

Tigsen
15th level half-dark-elf bard on Innoruuk

--- "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...> wrote:
> From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
> Not sure if this has been posted yet, but an interesting
side
> benefit of the
> song is that you can now do quests with NPC's who would
not talk to
> you
> before. This is possibly one of the biggest uses of the
song
> besides
> selling items at better prices.
>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox
>
>
